game.name: SpellBurst Barrage
game.categories: Single-player, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: SpellBurst Barrage is a Spell Crafting top-down arena shooter survival roguelite. Combine spells for customized attacks and unleash a barrage of elemental fury. Use different elemental damage types and synergies. Summon allied creatures to support you in combat.
game.shortDescriptionEn: SpellBurst Barrage is a Spell Crafting top-down arena shooter survival roguelite. Combine spells for customized attacks and unleash a barrage of elemental fury. Use different elemental damage types and synergies. Summon allied creatures to support you in combat.
